name: Kurofune: Descobrimentos Portugueses
description:
Warning: This is a DEMO version of the final game. We are 4 recently graduated Portuguese Game Developers trying to start a Game Studio.
Every donation is appreciated and will contribute to the development of new games and to improve quality.
Contact us via our Discord server -> (#open-ticked) if you want to contribute.
Thank you, 3PA Studios.

Be the captain of a Portuguese ship on a daring journey from Lisbon to Japan!

Don't expect an easy ride, there are over 20 locations, 50 tradable items, and multiple ships that will not hesitate to steal them from you.
Choose your play style... warriors, medics, cooks, entertainers, or sailors. A mix of all?
Think carefully before making any decision, they will influence your future and also how the rest of the world sees you.
  • Reputation - Negotiators might not like a captain with a bad reputation...
  • Crew Morale - Be careful with riots...
  • Crew Health - You don't want your crew sick.. trust me.
Along the way, there are multiple references to historical battles and items from Portuguese culture. Use your nautical journal to keep track of everything.
Are you the chosen one to reach Japan?



Pirates... they can cause some trouble but the reward could be worth it.



You are the Captain! Tell your crew where to go.



Balancing every variable could be and will be challenging.



Some locations have certain resources and others don't... you can profit from that.



Storms are a nightmare. Don't let your ship sink!
